root.name: Samurai Warriors 2
root.description: OverviewSamurai Warriors 2 is the second game in Koei's Samurai Warriors series. Developed by Omega Force, it was released in 2006. The game's larger roster includes a number of characters not seen in the original game or the first game's Xtreme Legends expansion. A number of tweaks were also made to returning characters to better refine both the gameplay and presentation.
